entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High 8 except plus 4 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High 8 except plus 4 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 15 April 2023
